reviewText: This was a gift for someone who specifically wanted the movie, A Chance of Snow. He loves it!
Received quickly and item is just as described. Looking forward to watching it during the Christmas season. Good Seller
Not as good as some of the classics but still nice. Don't watch it while your tired it will but u to sleep. Only my opinion.

This is definitely not a family-friendly movie.  The quality of the black and white features is very poor and grainy.  Within the first 7 minutes of the feature color movie, there were several sexual references made.  Would not recommend as a family nor a feel-good Christmas movie.  Not suitable to watch in front of children.
